page.title: 14TOURISM :CALEDONIAN CANAL
page.content:
{....".DAY CRUISES FROM INVERNESS". DAY CRUISES ARE RUN BY BRITISH WATER- WAYS BOARD DURING THE SUMMER SEASON. TOURS IN SCOTT 11 INTO LOCH NESS GO AS FAR AS URQUHART CASTLE. YOU CAN BUY REFRESHMENTS ON BOARD. CRUISES TAKE PLACE MORNINGS, AFTERNOONS AND EVENINGS.JACOBITE CRUISES, GLENURQUHART ROAD, ALSO RUN CANAL AND LOCH CRUISES.
{....."HIRE CRUISERS FROM INVERNESS".} CLAEY CRUISERS, CANAL ROAD, MUIRTOWN HAVE A FLEET OF 50 CRUISERS.THEY ARE FOR HIRE ON A WEEKLY BASIS. THE SMALLEST CRUISER SLEEPS 2-4 AND THE LARGEST SLEEPS 6-8. INSTRUCTION IS GIVEN BEFORE THE HOLIDAY BEGINS.ABOUT ONE THIRD OF THE VISITORS WHO HIRE CRUISERS HAVE NEVER HANDLED A BOAT BEFORE.
